welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shinozaki, a charming city known for its stunning cherry blossoms, traditional tea houses, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the beauty this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: 桃太郎 唐戸本店
restaurants.description: 桃太郎 唐戸本店 is a udon restaurant located in 下関市.

restaurants.description: おかもと鮮魚店 is a seafood restaurant located in 下関市.

restaurants.name: Curry Honpo (伽哩本舗 門司港レトロ店)
restaurants.description: Curry Honpo (伽哩本舗 門司港レトロ店) is a japanese curry restaurant located in 北九州市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
